localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
blogPost.body: Distributed is a new live social chat app to help remote teams stay in sync. It started off as a jamstack demo but after spending 2-3 hours on it every day we realised it filled a huge hole in our work life as we all went remote.
blogPost.title: Distributed - Stay in sync with friends, family and colleagues
blogPost.author: Asim Aslam

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的实时社交聊天应用，帮助远程团队保持同步。它一开始只是一个果酱演示，但在每天花2-3个小时在上面之后，我们意识到它填补了我们工作生活中的一个巨大漏洞，因为我们都去了远程。
localize.tagline: 与朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

localize.description: Distributed是一款新的實時社交聊天應用，幫助遠程團隊保持同步。它一開始只是一個果醬演示，但在每天花2-3個小時在上面之後，我們意識到它填補了我們工作生活中的一個巨大漏洞，因爲我們都去了遠程。
localize.tagline: 與朋友、家人和同事保持同步。

next.excerpt: Bambuser’s Live Video Shopping technology drives customer engagement and sales for some of the world’s largest brands and retailers. Bambuser is now the platform of choice for companies seeking deeper connection with customers across digital platforms.
next.title: Bambuser - Live video shopping

localize.description: Bambuser的实时视频购物技术为一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推动了客户参与和销售。Bambuser现已成为企业在数字平台上寻求与客户更深层次联系的首选平台。
Bambuser的實時視頻購物技術爲一些世界上最大的品牌和零售商推動了客戶參與和銷售。Bambuser現已成爲企業在數字平臺上尋求與客戶更深層次聯繫的首選平臺。
